Uses of Package
game

  • Packages that use game 
    Package Description
    game  
  • Classes in game used by game 
    Class and Description
    AmmunitionCartridge
    Cartridge of ammunition that holds a number of bullets for any gun.
    AttackAction
    An action for attacking other Actors.
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
    Coin
    A class representing a unit of the game's currency
    CraftableItem
    An interface which marks items as craftable.
    Gun
    Weapon item that can attack at range.
    HarvestAction
    An abstract class for harvesting a crop.
    HarvestBehaviour
    A behaviour for harvesting ripe crops and placing them in the actor's inventory
    Healing
    Interface for any object that is capable of healing an actor
    HitProbability
    Interface for anything that defines its chance of hitting or missing when attacking.
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    Limb
    Represents a Zombie's limb and can be used as a weapon.
    MenuAction
    Interface for actions that open menus to select another action
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    Product
    A class representing a store product.
    Shop
    A class representing a shop
    SniperRifle
    A class representing a sniper rifle As part of our bonus marks features, it can be crafted into a turret
    Toggleable
    An interface for objects that can be switched between 2 states (such as a lever or door)
    Turret
    A class representing a turret
    Wallet
    An interface for objects in the game that can collect and spend coins
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieCapability
